main event: A US Navy pilot observed a light source illuminating the sky while flying near Biga, Turkey.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 18 June 1960 and was reported at 2015Z,The observation was made from an aircraft approximately 12 miles north of Biga,The pilot was unable to determine the direction of the light's movement,The conclusion of the report was that the light was probably a meteor,The document is part of Project Blue Book, which was a US Air Force investigation.
sighted object: a light source in the sky
